Key Match Events: Isaiah Joe scored 31 points and made 8 three-pointers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks allowed 126 points, their third such occurrence in the past 15 days
Others: The Knicks made just four three-pointers and hit 38.5% of their shots from the field
OG Anunoby missed all of his shots during the first half
Jalen Brunson has converted multiple 3s in a game just once since Dec. 21
